Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3618 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.5.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3618 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.5.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtiff is earlier than 4.5.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-3618
